title: Ismaila Ouedraogo
text: I am a digital health researcher and digital project manager working in health information systems and implementation science. I focus on developing and deploying digital solutions adapted to local contexts, improving health information quality and use, and advancing digital health literacy in low-resource settings.

title: Ismaila Ouedraogo
text:
